name: numberZ
description:
Basic Rules

Rule 1: Search for numbers with equal value or numbers that add up to 10 and tap them.

Rule 2: Pairs can be horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.

Rule 3: Search for numbers that are separated by empty cells. Diagonally opposite numbers can also make pairs.

Rule 4: Check the ending of one line on the right and the beginning of the following line on the left for matches.

Rule 5: You advance to the next level by clearing all of the numbers on the board.

If there are no pairs left, you can add more numbers with the Add button. The lines will be filled with numbers that are remaining on the board in the same order.

If you cannot find any matches you can get hints by clicking the Hint button.

Rewards and costs (in coins):
Clear a row: 50
Clear a Level: 30
Get a Hint: -10
Add more numbers: -20 

Matching numbers are awarded based on their distance from each other
